items.sentence: Why don\'t you ask Tom if he\'d like to come with us?
We often hear it said that Japanese are good workers.
Tom\'s negative attitude is beginning to irritate me.
The job was difficult, but Tom still wanted to do it.
The last time I saw Tom, he was headed for the beach.
I find the food here to be a little too spicy for me.
I thought I\'d check out what\'s happening in Boston.
Does anybody here have an umbrella that I can borrow?
Tom realized that there was nothing more he could do.
Why don\'t you tell us a little bit about yourselves?
